meanings.definition: A yellowish deposit of fat underneath the skin
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with xanthomas after noticing the yellowish deposits under the skin.
meanings.sent2: Hereditary xanthomas can sometimes be seen as yellow bumps on the skin.
meanings.sent3: The xanthomas under his skin made him look like a walking banana!
meanings.sent4: The xanthomas on her body glowed like little drops of sunshine trapped beneath her skin.
meanings.sent5: The xanthomas were like tiny nuggets of gold hidden just beneath the surface.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the development of xanthomas
meanings.sent1: The rare genetic disorder led to the development of xanthomas all over his body.
meanings.sent2: People with certain lipid metabolism disorders may experience the condition of xanthomas.
meanings.sent3: His xanthomas were so abundant, it looked like he was growing a crop of yellow peas under his skin!
meanings.sent4: The xanthomas spread across her body like a map of golden islands in a sea of skin.
meanings.sent5: The xanthomas were a visible reminder of the body's struggle with excess fats.
